reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Transparency access to information and personal data protection in Moldova: Striking a balance

description.narrative: The Overall objective of the project is to promote proper protection of the right to privacy and prevent the misuse of privacy protection guarantees against the public interest so as to safeguard the freedom of the press transparency of decision making acc ountability for corruption in Moldova.The project?s specific objectives are: 1.Identifying and reporting on lacks in the interpretation and application of privacy laws;2.Developing policy recommendations and guidelines and promote international best practi ces in the field;3.Preventing the abusive application of the legislation on privacy protection by achieving and promoting an understanding and interpretation of personal data protection and privacy standards that is in line with international best practice freedom of press transparency and the fight against corruption and have this interpretation recognized and endorsed by authorities civil society and the general public.
